fn.p: Author Contributions T.M.S. and K.A.H. generated the data and prepared Figures 2 and 3. N.M. prepared Figure 1. W.D.G. and C.S.M. generated the particulate charcoal data. T.M.S., K.A.H., N.M. and J.T.O. prepared the written manuscript. J.A.P., C.A.S., J.W.K. and C.W.H. assisted with experimental design, fieldwork and sampling. All authors reviewed the manuscript.
